        Checks the command and if it was sent in a PM to the bot.
        Specified by:
        shouldExecute in interface Command
        Parameters:
        guild - Guild, guild the message was received from, can be null for PM's.
        author - User, the author of the message.
        channel - MessageChannel, channel the message was received in.
        message - String, the contents of the message received.
        Returns:
        boolean, true if the commands should be executed.
